How many people are affected by trisomy 13 ?,"Trisomy 13 occurs in about 1 in 16,000 newborns. Although women of any age can have a child with trisomy 13, the chance of having a child with this condition increases as a woman gets older.",GHR,trisomy 13
What are the genetic changes related to trisomy 13 ?,"Most cases of trisomy 13 result from having three copies of chromosome 13 in each cell in the body instead of the usual two copies. The extra genetic material dis
